title: Helping a fellow fresher
content:
Im joining RR CAMPUS what are must bring items for hostel
Thanks for the help in advance!

comments.body:
Hostel Checklist

1) Clothes all kinds of (1 pair of tradionals, formals etc.. there would be events in college where you may have to change)

2) All your tech stuff..

3) Toiletries, (i think you can buy bucket in hostel, but just get 1 just in case)

4) 2-3 locks with at-least 4 keys... for your room, hostel and cupboards

5) Mattress and pillow (they maybe available in hostel)

That would be the essentials, anything else can be found around college (to buy) so you are all good!
